ValidationRule.description: Cannot change the Merge Name field on Accts designated for Merge (appended with "sfdcapi1") by the Integration process
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")), LOWER(RIGHT( PRIORVALUE( Merge_Name__c), 8))= "sfdcapi1", ISCHANGED( Merge_Name__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: ***You cannot change this field, This record has already been designated as a merge with a higher priorty***
